channel.title: Client Problem [HELP ME]
channel.description: i run the source, it loads everything up, when i run the client it loads, than it stays on 'connecting to update server' like the server told me, change the client ip to your ip, but it still doesnt work I AM USING HAMACHI BTW :|

item.title: Client Problem [HELP ME]

item.description:

I’m not sure that a client that connects to a server to make it run, can connect to the server to make it run through hamachi, try port fowarding.
